Trade/Device Name(s): FreeStyle Precision Neo Blood Glucose Monitoring System
FreeStyle Precision Neo Blood Glucose Meter
FreeStyle Precision Neo Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FreeStyle Precision Neo Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing amperometric technology for quantitative glucose measurement in fresh capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh whole blood from fingertips for self-testing by lay users; not for neonatal samples or diagnosis/screening of diabetes; indicated for home management of diabetes, single user only.
